sentence.Network_en: Browning's prediction is no better than a wild guess.
sentence.Network_cn: 勃朗宁的预测不过是妄加猜测而已。

sentence.Network_en: Not many people agree with the government's prediction that the economy will improve.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有多少人赞同政府认为经济将会有所改善的预测。

sentence.Network_en: This great prediction is coming true.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一伟大的预言即将成为事实.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 预测（prediction）和预言(prophecy) 是有分别的。在英语中这两个词很容易就被混淆。
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 39 predict v. 预知,预言,预报 41 prediction n. 预言,预报 43 come true 实现,达到.
财务英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... predetermined overhead rate 预定间接费用分配率 prediction 预估 predictive ability 预估能力.
predicted variable 被预测变量prediction 预见prediction of criminal mentality 犯罪心理预测.

list.abs: SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... anticipate v. 预期 predictable adj. 可预言的... foresee v. 预见.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precocious 早熟的 predict 预言,预报 predisposition 倾向,癖性.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... jurisdiction n 司法权 predict v 预言；预告 indict v 起诉，控诉.
提倡预测性(predictive)、预防性(preventive)和个体化(Dersonalized)的3P医学理念。 转化医学早已在全球.
除了可预测性（predictability）之外，我觉得可行性（feasibility）对我来说，比较重要啦。ㄟ？

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin praedictio(n-), from praedicere 'make known beforehand' (see predict)

entry.def: If you make a prediction about something, you say what you think will happen.

example.ex: He was unwilling to make a prediction about which books would sell in the coming year...
example.tran: 他不愿意预测来年哪些书会有销路。

example.ex: Predictions that the recession will be short are small comfort to those already affected...
example.tran: 关于经济衰退不会延续很长时间的预测对那些已经受到影响的人来说只是小小的安慰。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of predicting (as by reasoning about the future)
2. a statement made about the future

auth_sentence.content: Wish fulfilment, reportage or near-future prediction is unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wish fulfilment, reportage or near-future prediction is unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wish fulfilment, reportage or near-future prediction is unclear.

auth_sentence.content: It allows for a good prediction for our future.
auth_sentence.res_content: It allows for a good prediction for our future.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It allows for a good prediction for our future.

auth_sentence.content: It's the worst prediction in all of physics.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's the worst prediction in all of physics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's the worst prediction in all of physics.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 对立的;引起矛盾的,爱反驳别人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: contradict[v.反驳;矛盾]+ory……的→adj.对立的;引起矛盾的,爱反驳别人的
vin力量+dict说话,断言,写+ive……的→adj.报复性的
addict[v.上瘾,入迷]+ion动作或状态→n.沉溺,上瘾
bene好+dict说+ion表名词→说好话
dict说话,断言,写+ion状态→说话状态→措辞
diction[n.措辞]+ary物→措辞的书→字典
dict说话,断言,写+um→说[出]的话→格言
e出+dict说话,断言,写→说出→布告

stems_affixes.value_cn: 索引,[数学]指数, 指标, [刻度盘上]指针
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+dex=dict说话,断言,写→说进去→索引,使其明白→指标,指针
dictate[v.口授;[使]听写;指令,指示,命令]+or人→发命令者
inter在……中间+dict说话,断言,写→在中间说,不让做
juris司法+dict说话,断言,写+ion表名词→n.管辖权;司法权
male坏+dict说+ion表名词→说坏话
predict[v.预言,预报]+ion动作或状态→n.预言,预告;预报
vale再见+dict说话,断言,写+ion表名词→说再见

stems_affixes.value_cn: [陪审团的]裁决,判决;判断;定论
stems_affixes.word_buile: ver真实+dict说话,断言,写→说真话
indict[v.控诉,起诉]+ment表名词→n.控告
ad一再+dict说→一再说起→对……入迷
contra反+dict说→反着说→反驳

stems_affixes.value_cn: 口授;[使]听写;指令,指示,命令
stems_affixes.word_buile: dict说话,断言,写+ate表动词→说话→口授,命令
in进入+dex=dict说话,断言,写→说进去→索引,使其明白→指标,指针
in进去+dict说话,断言,写→进去说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 写[文章,信等]创作, 赋诗, 创作

inter在……中间+dict说话,断言,写→在中间说,不让做
pre预先+dict说→预先说→预言

Sentence.sentence: Contrary to many people's prediction of its death, the film industry survived.
Predictions of the collapse of the tropical rain forests have been around for years.
I am responsible for financial development programs in many parts of the world, so forecasting long range trends and making predictions on the basis of present evidence is what I do.
Both of these things are also about making long-term predictions on the basis of present evidence

sentences.en: This great prediction is coming true.
sentences.cn: 这一伟大的预言正在成为现实。
